credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Side Chapel, with Figures of Charity, the Virgin, and Saints
medium: Pen and gray ink, gray, pink wash, white gouche on white laid paper
description: A canopy is shown as the frame of a painting over an altar in the center.  Laterally are pilasters, the left one showing a candle bracket. An escutcheon is held by two angels in the left bay; "Love" with four children is shown in the right bay.  Curtains are in either bay.  The Immaculate Conception is shown in the conch, revered by angels and two small saints.
name: Drawing
